duties_responsibilities.duty: Interpreting, obtaining, preparing/compounding, labeling, and distributing pharmacy products for patient use while considering patient age and relevant information.
Preparing IV medications using special equipment, supplies, and techniques for patient administration, and processing refill requests for non-monitored pharmacy medication.
Documenting the distribution of medication for proper use and reimbursement in accordance with department policy.
Being involved in production, packaging, record keeping, and stocking tasks.
